Package com.fitconnet.persitence.repository

Interface ActivityRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Activity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Activity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Activity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Activity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Activity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Activity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Activity,Long>
@Repository("activityRepository") public interface ActivityRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Activity,Long>
Repository interface for managing activities.

  • Method Details

    • existByDate

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(n) > 0 FROM Activity n WHERE n.date = ?1") Boolean existByDate(Date date)
      Checks if an activity exists for a given date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to check.
      Returns:
      true if an activity exists for the given date, false otherwise.

    • findByActivityPlace

      @Query("SELECT n FROM Activity n WHERE n.place = :place") Optional<List<Activity>> findByActivityPlace(@Param("place") String place)
      Finds activities by their place.
      Parameters:
      place - The place of the activities to find.
      Returns:
      An optional containing a list of activities with the specified place.

    • findByActivityType

      @Query("SELECT n FROM Activity n WHERE n.type = :activityType") Optional<List<Activity>> findByActivityType(@Param("activityType") String activityType)
      Finds activities by their type.
      Parameters:
      activityType - The type of the activities to find.
      Returns:
      An optional containing a list of activities with the specified type.
